JobTitle: Manager, Soft Goods Product Design Engineering, Facebook Reality Labs
JobFullDesc: Facebook Reality Labs’s Soft Goods team is leading the industry with the seamless integration of high-performance textiles and other specialty materials with next-generation consumer electronics products.  We are pushing the boundaries of what is possible in order to deliver delightful, approachable, and comfortable experiences for our customers.We are looking for a soft goods-savvy and experienced people manager to lead and grow our team of highly accomplished soft goods product design engineers. The ideal candidate will have demonstrated hands-on experience developing and engineering soft goods products, accessories, and integrated interface elements for consumer electronics.  They will be committed to fostering a collaborative and inclusive work environment where every team member is empowered to leverage their strengths in order to deliver their best impact. They will also demonstrate strong communication skills, the capacity to connect meaningfully with their direct reports, and the skill with which to drive consensus and collaboration across functional
